about_the_game:
Take charge of your very own graveyard in Zombie Graveyard Simulator, where peaceful daytime management collides with chaotic nighttime survival. During the day, bury corpses, maintain graves, and keep your cemetery spotless to impress visitors. Grow crops and gather resources to keep yourself sustained and unlock essential upgrades that improve your chances of survival.

But when the sun sets, everything changes. Relentless zombie hordes rise from the shadows, threatening everything you've built. Protect your cemetery by building defenses, setting traps, and preparing for intense battles. Balance the calm precision of management simulation with the adrenaline-pumping action of survival combat.

Whether you're expanding your graveyard with new facilities like crematoriums and acid tanks, managing resources to stay alive, or battling the undead, Zombie Graveyard Simulator offers a unique blend of strategy, creativity, and action.

This game is in active development, and there’s much more to share in the near future. Stay tuned for updates, and prepare to dig deep—both literally and figuratively!
